scripts.start:renderer: lerna run tsc && lerna run start --scope @applications/renderer --stream
scripts.start:widget-editor: cd src/packages/widget-editor && yarn compile && lerna run tsc && lerna run start --scope @applications/widget-editor --stream
scripts.test: jest --verbose ./src/packages && (cd src/applications/renderer && yarn test --watchAll=false) && (cd src/applications/widget-editor && yarn test --watchAll=false)
